text: Hey! How are you?
I am fine, and you?
Doing really well. I was curious if you have any particular charities that you admire or donate to.
No none in particular
I've got a couple that I am interested in but sometimes I wonder if the money goes where they say, you know?
Yea that is exactly how I feel as well, I like helping out but I dont want it to be in vain

I did a survey on here a while back that laid out a couple charities really thoroughly and then offered to let me give up some of my "reward" for the survey to the charity. I thought it was an interesting idea. Plus sometimes I\'m just lazy and that\'s an easy uncomplicated way to do it.
Yes, i do like that concept. However, I often wonder what a big difference it would really make

Remember that ice bucket challenge thing that was super popular a while back? I thought it was fun but wouldn't do anything productive. Turns out they raised so much money it some drug trial through and they've found a drug that helps and is now on the market and that just blew me away. Downside of course is people still have to part with money they already had. I donated some of my reward to the charity because it wasn't really out of my pocket and I guess I figured every little bit might help.
Oh wow, I never knew that! That is amazing what a difference we can make without thinking it would really make one
I know and besides it got my son to dump a bucket of ice water on himself which was just hilarious.
That is funny! Honestly, before the challenge I never even heard about ALS, so I guess it did its job by spreading awareness

That's really true. Maybe on top of people not wanting the rigamarole of the donation process sometimes all we need is a better understanding of the need or just faith that a little from everyone can go a long way.
Yea, maybe more challenges can be done to spread awareness to diseases that often go unnoticed or unheard of

Yeah, maybe, people just need information, ease of donating, and a sense of community about it all. This HIT we are doing is kind of doing the same thing as that other survey I did. We both get our base pay and then can choose to keep the added incentive or donate a portion of it to the charity Save the Children. I was contemplating giving some of mine away. I've worked overseas with kids through medical clinics and have seen how far what we think of as a small amount of money can really go.
Yes, I am willing to donate a portion to the charity
I was going to donate half of mine. Some for me for the work and some for them in the hopes it helps.  How much would you like to donate to Save the Children out of the payment?
Yes I would like to donate .75 towards the foundation
Brilliant. That's so kind of you. Between us both I hope it helps. And I love that they are giving their money to something other than profit, you know?
Yes! Hope it helps the children in some type of way
